text:
Do NOT leak the twist in names or state:
- Avoid personalized context fields
- Avoid on-the-nose action/entity names
- Prefer neutral, common verbs.

AVAILABLE ACTIONS
[

- 避免直白的行為/實體名稱
- 偏好中立、常見的動詞。
